org.drip.product.fx

Class FXSpot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.product.fx.FXSpot

  • public class FXSpot
extends Serializer
    Class contains the FX spot contract parameters - the spot date and the currency pair.
